CHAT.comment: ANITA ALVAREZ, COOK COUNTY STATE'S ATTORNEY Petitioner v. CHERMANE SMITH, ET AL.
The above-entitled matter came on for oral argument before the Supreme Court of the United States at 10:03 a.m.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF PAUL CASTIGLIONE ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONER
ORAL ARGUMENT OF WILLIAM M. JAY ON BEHALF OF THE UNITED STATES, AS AMICUS CURIAE, SUPPORTING THE PETITIONER
ORAL ARGUMENT OF THOMAS PETERS ON BEHALF OF THE RESPONDENTS
REBUTTAL ARGUMENT OF PAUL CASTIGLIONE ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONER
(Whereupon, at 11:09 a.m., the case in the above-entitled matter was submitted.)
